news.title: Dealer at ‘highest level’ of Dublin drugs network is jailed for 15 years
news.summary: A married father-of-four who led a Dublin drug cell has been jailed for 15 years after being caught with €10m in drugs and cash as well as a stolen garda uniform.

news.title: ‘No, it wasn’t me’ – Minister O’Donovan denies leaking ‘garbage’ claims about An Post on ‘brink of financial collapse’
news.summary: Communications Minister Patrick O’Donovan denied leaking claims about An Post to the media, after its CEO dismissed reports it was on the “brink” of financial collapse as “utter garbage”.

news.title: Joseph Grogan inquest concludes with widow in tears and bombshell accusations
news.summary: Lisa Flaherty stormed out of the packed room, visibly angered. The sugg­estion that she had been in a relationship with Joseph Grogan since she was 16 had caused his family “endless ­anxiety”, solicitor and senior counsel Damien Tansey was telling the court.

news.title: Johnny Healy-Rae says ‘he is extremely lucky’ after hand crushed in work-related accident
news.summary: Kilgarvan councillor Johnny Healy-Rae has been working with machinery since he could walk and is more than aware of the safety risks, yet a momentary decision in recent days while working with a tractor resulted in a serious accident.

news.title: ‘There’s a clear plan to have a dominant series and win’ - Dan Sheehan backs Henry Pollock’s 3-0 Lions series ambition
news.summary: Dan Sheehan sits himself down, folds his arms and awaits the questions. He’s here to set the tone.

news.title: Irish aviation and whiskey face hits as EU’s retaliation list to Trump tariffs takes shape
news.summary: The Irish aviation and whiskey sectors are bracing for the impact of tit-for-tat tariffs after bourbon whiskey and Boeing aircraft were included on a list of US goods to be hit with tariffs in the event that negotiations with the Trump administration fail.

news.title: X adds pornographic mode to AI assistant days before Irish media regulator’s crackdown on age-verification for children
news.summary: Just days before the Irish media regulator is to begin a crackdown on age verification for children using adult services online, Elon Musk’s X has added a pornographic mode to its general AI assistant, Grok, which is available to 12 years olds in the two main app stores.

news.title: Ask a money coach: ‘My ex owes me more than €1,000. How do I get it back?’
‘I don’t get asked for selfies, people recognise only my voice,’ says RTÉ’s Claire Byrne
news.summary: RTÉ broadcaster Claire Byrne is rarely asked for selfies because it’s her famous voice that makes people do a double take.

news.title: ‘She would say life is too short to be holding grudges’ – Ireland’s oldest woman Sarah Coyle dies at the age of 108
news.summary: Ireland’s oldest woman Sarah Coyle has died at the age of 108.
